notes:
This spatial dataset provides the delimitation and composition of the DPR Korea national boundary. It comprises one national boundary, and is attributed with the country name in English. This dataset was obtained from WFP in 2013.

International boundary dissolved from admin level 1 polygon dataset.

This dataset was provided to  the UN-OCHA Regional Office for the Asia-Pacific by the World Food Programme.  It is believed that the original source of the data is the Global Mapping initiative.
